MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L39 postcode area of Ormskirk, affecting properties in Whalley Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:21am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:32pm on 27th January 2021.
